question: You are planning to migrate your on-premises compute and SAP workloads to Google Cloud. You want to follow Google-recommended practices to quickly create a cost estimate for running these workloads in Google Cloud. What should you do?

options.text: Leverage Cloud Asset Inventory to gather data and generate a cost estimate.
Use the Google Cloud pricing calculator, and input the estimated resource to generate a cost estimate.
Engage with a Google Cloud partner to perform a comprehensive assessment and provide a customized cost estimate.
Gather data about your current environment, and leverage Google Cloud Migration Center to generate a cost estimate.
